::Zardus::

Zardus looks down at his wrist comp as it beeps, announcing a new pod 
in the area.

"Gotron," he says into his comm-link, "Can you take an underwater 
suit and retrieve the pod at the following coordinates?"

Zardus finishes the transmission, sending the coordinates.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> 
>     Less than 2000 feet away from the Alliance Island a black pod 
surfaced to 
> the top of the see, its scanning equipment coming out of the shell 
and 
> initiating the DNA scan.  This pod was one of the originals from 
the Axalon, 
> breaking orbit after the Planetbuster struck, and the pod crashed 
into the 
> sea, and seismic activity only now released it.
